#Description: Do not output the trailing newline
#Syntax: echo a; echo b; output :; a; b; echo -n a; echo b; output : ab

#Syntax: echo "Name \\t Bhansali"; output :; Name \t Bhansali; echo -e "Name \t Bhansali; output :; Name		Bhansali; (\t is Tab)"
